name: Afterlife (itch) (Logham)
description:
This is a story driven, point-and-click adventure game, influenced by the DOS games of our childhood, with a Cyberpunk theme.

You play as David Cabochon, a detective called to investigate a situation where someone has "expired without warning". Emerse yourself in David's world,  and unravel the mystery before you.

Created by:

  • Jo Purple

Programmed by:

  • Logham

Created for the #PowerPointGameJam.

That's right! This game is powered entirely by PowerPoint. It wasn't easy, but we managed to get a lot of things working  so we could pull this off (in a very short period of time).

Troubleshooting

  1. Please read the first slide of the PowerPoint!
  2. You must use a 'fairly' recent PowerPoint version (late 2016+). We show a warning message when you start the game if you are using a version known to have issues. We advise you run the update tool within PowerPoint (File->Account->Office Updates)  itself to avoid disappointment. <3Most notable symptoms of using old PowerPoint versions are:
    • Crashing on scene change
    • Inventory items disappearing
  3. If you are on 2016+ and are still having issues please comment below. Please include your version numbers (displayed at the top-right of the game's main-menu) when leaving a comment about troubleshooting.
